question_text: What is one benefit of Desktop as a Service (DaaS)?
answer_options: Allows direct access to hypervisor settings
Enables lightweight, centralized desktop delivery via cloud infrastructure
Installs virtual desktops on local hardware permanently
Creates containers for isolated application testing
correct_answer: Enables lightweight, centralized desktop delivery via cloud infrastructure
explanation: DaaS provides hosted virtual desktops accessible from anywhere over the internet.
